snippet: Democrats won three of four special House elections on Tuesday, blocking a Republican takeover attempt and solidifying power in the last legislative chamber in the South that they control.
abstract: Kentucky Democrats win three of four special House elections, stopping Republican takeover of state's House of Representatives, last legislative chamber in South controlled by Democrats.
lead_paragraph: Democrats won three of four special House elections on Tuesday, blocking a Republican takeover attempt and solidifying power in the last legislative chamber in the South that they control.

headline.main: Democrats Keep Control of the Kentucky House
headline.print_headline: Democrats Keep Control of the Kentucky House
